meanings.definition: An introductory section of a book.
meanings.sent1: The proleg of the story set the stage for the exciting adventure ahead.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the proleg of a new book to get a sense of what's to come.
meanings.sent3: The proleg of the book was like a sneak peek into the world the author created.
meanings.sent4: Her proleg was a doorway into a magical realm of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The proleg painted a vivid picture of the story waiting to unfold.

meanings.definition: To write or introduce a proleg.
meanings.sent1: She will proleg the new book with an engaging introduction.
meanings.sent2: I need to proleg this manuscript before sending it to the publisher.
meanings.sent3: He proleged the document with a personal touch that captivated the readers.
meanings.sent4: The author proleged the novel with a mysterious twist that intrigued the audience.
meanings.sent5: Prolegging a story requires setting the right tone from the very beginning.
